rules_text:
Foreshadow 5–{R}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with five time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
Flying, trample
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Spawn of Skalathak and each other creature you control.
